Package oop

Class Pharmacist

java.lang.Object
oop.UserLogic.Role
oop.HospitalStaff
oop.Pharmacist
public class Pharmacist extends HospitalStaff
The Pharmacist class represents a pharmacist in the hospital system. This class provides functionalities specific to a pharmacist's role, including viewing appointment outcomes, updating prescription status, and managing medication stock levels.
Since:
2024-11-09 Inherits from HospitalStaff.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pharmacist

      public Pharmacist(String name, String staffID, int age, Gender gender)
      Constructs a Pharmacist instance with the specified details. Adds the pharmacist to the hospital's staff list.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the pharmacist
      staffID - the unique ID of the pharmacist
      age - the age of the pharmacist
      gender - the gender of the pharmacist

  • Method Details

    • viewAppointmentOutcomeRecord

      public void viewAppointmentOutcomeRecord()
      Prompts the user to enter a patient ID and displays the patient's appointment outcome records. If no appointment outcomes are available, a message is displayed.

    • findPatientById

      public static Patient findPatientById(String id)
      Finds a patient by their unique ID and return it
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the patient
      Returns:
      the Patient object if found, null otherwise

    • updatePrescriptionStatus

      public void updatePrescriptionStatus()
      Allows the pharmacist to update the prescription status of a patient's medication. The method prompts the pharmacist for a patient ID and displays the prescribed medications that have not yet been dispensed. If confirmed, the status of the medications is updated to dispensed, and the stock is adjusted in the system. Else, the system will indicate no changes were made.

    • submitReplenishRequest

      public void submitReplenishRequest()
      Submits a request to replenish the stock of a specified medicine. The pharmacist enters the medicine name and the requested quantity, and this information is recorded in the hospital's list of replenishment requests which will be accessible and approvedby the administrator.

    • updateMedStockCSV

      public void updateMedStockCSV(String name, int newStock)
      Updates the stock of a specified medicine in the CSV file that maintains medicine records to ensure persistent data storage and accurate values
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine to update
      newStock - the new stock quantity to set for the medicine

    • retrieveRoleDescription

      public void retrieveRoleDescription()
      Prints a description of the role for a pharmacist.
      Overrides:
      retrieveRoleDescription in class HospitalStaff
